faq.question: How quickly will I hear back?
faq.answer: We aim to respond within 2 hours during business hours (Mon-Fri, 9am-6pm PST). For urgent matters, use our live chat or call us directly. After hours submissions receive responses first thing the next business day.

faq.question: Will I be added to a sales funnel or receive spam?
faq.answer: Absolutely not. We're here to help, not to harass. You'll only receive relevant communications based on your specific inquiry. You can unsubscribe from any updates at any time.

faq.question: Do I need to provide a credit card or commit to anything?
faq.answer: No. We just need enough information to provide you with helpful, relevant answers. There are no hidden fees, commitments, or surprise charges.

faq.question: What if I'm just researching and not ready to buy?
faq.answer: That's totally fine! We're happy to answer questions and provide resources even if you're months away from a decision. Our goal is to be helpful, not pushy.

faq.question: Can I schedule a specific time to talk?
faq.answer: Absolutely. Use our calendar booking system to pick a time that works for you. We offer 15, 30, 45, and 60-minute slots based on your needs.

faq.question: What if I have a really technical or specific question?
faq.answer: Perfect! We love technical questions. Our team includes engineers and solution architects who can dive deep into implementation details, API specifics, and integration requirements.

faq.question: Do you offer support for implementation?
faq.answer: Yes. We provide comprehensive onboarding, training, and ongoing support. Our customer success team ensures you get maximum value from day one.

faq.question: What happens to my data and information?
faq.answer: Your data is encrypted, secure, and never shared with third parties. We're SOC 2 Type II certified and GDPR compliant. Read our privacy policy for full details.

faq.question: Can I speak with someone in my industry or use case?
faq.answer: Often, yes. We work across many industries and can often connect you with team members who have specific experience in your sector or use case.

faq.question: What if I need to cancel or reschedule?
faq.answer: No problem. You can reschedule or cancel any meeting through the calendar link in your confirmation email, or just reply to any of our emails.

catalyst.title: The Catalyst Moment
catalyst.story: In 2019, our founder watched countless brilliant companies struggle with fragmented AI solutions. That's when the vision crystallized: what if AI could be truly unified, intelligent, and transformative?
catalyst.impact: This moment sparked the creation of Artifically - where artificial intelligence meets genuine business transformation.
catalyst.vision: To democratize AI and make it accessible to every business, regardless of size or technical expertise.
